patthana16.77:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.77:5.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.77:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.77:7.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
